Description.Text: Hotel Riviera is a modern 4-star property offering convenient accommodation close to Milan Linate Airport. Highlights include a bar, free Wi-Fi and free parking. The hotel is situated approximately 3km from the airport terminals. Regional places of interest include the 15th-century Borromeo Castle and the public gardens, Parco Forlanini. Segrate train station provides fast and easy access to the centre of Milan. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with balconies on both sides of its top floor. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern cosy style with parquet flooring. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar air-conditioning, safe and free wired internet. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathrobe and a walk-in shower or bathtub with integrated shower. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the hotel bar which boasts a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
